response.original_title: Jayden Tries: The Fight 4 all Reality
response.overview: With Daniel Chapman's plans in full swing, a pre-cautious "Evil" Jayden - ready to better his name - is reluctant to take immediate action against him in fear that he'll make another mistake. Daniel and his companions Millie and Wii Play: Motion are preparing to finalize the Last Reality by purging every world across the multiverse and bringing the prime variants all into one world. Alongside "Evil" Alexia, Alex, Alfie, Sam, Leo and newcomer Ethan, can "Evil" Jayden try hard enough to save every living thing in existence?
response.title: Jayden Tries: The Fight 4 all Reality
